message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity! I believe this product is truly valuable and worth at least $1200000 to you. To start the conversation, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
